 072:     """
 073:     for k in range(total_models):
 074: 
 075:         model_comp_spec_modified[k] = [simple_mean(model_comp_spec_redshifted[k][indices[q]]) for q in range(resampling_lam_grid_length)]
 076:         # Using simple_mean here instead of np.mean gives a BIG improvement (~3x)
 077:         # np.mean probably does all kinds of checks before it computes the actual
 078:         # mean. It also probably works with different datatypes. Since we know that in
 079:         # our case we will always use floats we can easily use this simple_mean function.
 080:     """
